references.paper_title: Deep unsupervised learning using nonequilibrium thermodynamics
references.reason: This paper is foundational to diffusion models, introducing the concept of using stochastic differential equations to model data distributions.

references.paper_title: Generative modeling by estimating gradients of the data distribution
references.reason: This work provided a key theoretical framework that improved the efficiency of training diffusion models.
This paper significantly advanced the field by introducing a more efficient and effective training objective function for diffusion models.

references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This study demonstrated the superior performance of diffusion models over Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) on image synthesis tasks, accelerating wider adoption of diffusion models.
Classifier-free guidance (CFG) is a widely used technique for improving the quality of generated samples in diffusion models, making it highly influential.
